Name: Beach Rules
About the game: Beach Rules will test your memory , visual agility and reflex through various tests. Keep the beach in order and compete in different events and mini-games! FEATURES 8 mini games to play against the machine 3 special events: 'Scouring the beach', 'RCP' and 'CleanBot, beach-cleaner' Improve your beach at the end of each round Replay value. Make this summer last forever Special soundtrack 'Kawaii' pixel art design
